攓字的基本解释

攓
qiān
古同“搴”，拔取。
古同“攐”，把衣服提起来。

攓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《集韻》丘虔切，平仙，溪。］
(1)拔取，取。
(2)用手提起。
(3)简慢。
(4)见“攓撅”。

攓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攓； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页462第47
【集韻】【韻會】?丘虔切。與搴同。詳搴字註。【蘇軾·攓雲篇序】雲氣自山中來，以手掇，開籠收其中，歸家雲盈籠，開而放之，作攓雲篇。　又【正韻】苦堅切。義同。　又【集韻】九件切，音蹇。與㩃同。【揚子·方言】取也。南楚曰攓。【列子·天瑞篇】攓蓬而指。

攓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
攓字的起名意思

暂无。

Shove
Basic explanation of words
Shove
qiān
The ancient same "snap", pull out.
Gu Tong "scratched" and lifted his clothes.
Shove
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Jiyun" Qiu Qianqie, Pingxian, Xi. ]
(1) Pull out, take out.
(2) Lift by hand.
(3) Simple and slow.
(4) See "Shame".
Shove
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hands and Characters Department] 　攓; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Pages: Page 462 and 47
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme]? Qiu Qianqie. The same as the same. Detailed note of the word. [Su Shi·Lengyun Chapter Preface] Clouds come from the mountain, use your hand to control, open the cage to close it, and return home with the Yunying cage, open and let it go, making the Yunyun chapter.　[Zheng Yun] Hard and hard cut. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Nine pieces cut, with sound. Same as 㩃. 【Yangtze Dialect】Take also. Nan Chu said 攓. 【Liezi·Tianrui articles】Pengpeng and pointed.
